channel.title: War of Gods ~ All New Gamin Community
channel.description:
[img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/wog.png[/img] Basic Information: This is basically an online gaming community, we're trying to build up as best as we can :) [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/fatepk.png[/img] To Do List:
Rename the Client and the Source. Add better cache downloader! New Home: Edgeville Move: Elites Tormented Demons Add: Strykewyrms Nex With Everything Add Chaos Tunnels Amored Zombies Item Handling: Player Item Dropping Making it so you don't have to stand on items to pick it up. Add Items: Katana Red robin hood hat Yellow robin hood hat Blue robin hood hat White robin hood hat Vine Whip Golden Hammer Add Object: Gamer Groto Teleport Clan Wars Portals (Safe and Dangerous) Get Coords: Dungeoneering Citidal Armoured Zombies Chaos Tunnels Add Minigame: Soul Wars Clan Wars Stealing Creation Grand Exchange: Need to fix abort item, make it so it gives the item and doesn't crash client. Make sure it all works and everything. Combat: Fix the punching and kicking emotes. When you die drop items. Shops to Edit: PK Points Shop Donor Shop Make a new Donor Point Shop
Done:
Renamed the Source Moved the teleport to Edgeville
========================================================================= [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/wogeco.png[/img] Information Coming Soon [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/minecraft.png[/img] Information Coming Soon Please wait till I start working on it :) We are looking for a WoWPS and maybe some other games :) Team: Me RVDBoy David Someone Else? :o

item.title: War of Gods ~ All New Gamin Community
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

UPDATE LOG:

Gem crafting:
idk havent tried ask rune-wings

Woodcutting:

Walk up to tree
stop the second the tree goes down
no stopping while chopping
returns the correct stump
random spirits

Mining:

Returns the correct ore
Walk up to rock
returns the correct empty rock
no stop while mining

Theiving:

Every single stall in the game appears then disappears
correct facing
correct rewards (same as rs with the price changed)
all handled through object ticks (10)

Quests:

A cat tale
correct yellow, green, and red quests
the cat is untradeable
complete and she will sell you kittens

Agility:

Same barb course as sea-scape
complete all the objects and receive points
buy exp or elegant items
4 points every time, about 3 mins to complete, and elegant is 100 points a peice. (do the math)

Misc:

Great client (Quadro)
New animations added, character is still 317
npc with multiple dialouge to open shop (options)

For the skills i used sea-scapes as a base, but their 100x better and you wouldnt even recognize the codes if you compared them.

What were trying to do right now:

new npcs, just updated current ones (im an old school fan so that killed me :p)
Jon is finishing up the website
I’m going though the server trying to find any bugs

Read full topic
